title: Bright 1BR/1BA w/AC & 1 Parking Spot Available on First Hill
posting_body: Spacious 1BR/1BA with floor-to-ceiling windows in quiet building on First Hill.
Original parquet flooring, updated kitchen & bath - tons of storage!
This unit features a custom shelving configuration in the living room to create additional display shelving, entertainment center and a WFH desk for maximum space utilization.
It is in the MCM industrial style to match the apartment.
[Photos show different custom shelving that has been removed and do not show new updated shelving system currently installed, as well as updated window treatments]
Large bedroom can easily fit up to a king (or cal king) sized bed with plenty of room for nightstands and additional bedroom furniture.
The kitchen has updated appliances including; dishwasher & garbage disposal.
Laundry room is onsite with large new machines that accept cards.
This apartment has an optional assigned secured parking spot.
This is a pet-friendly building with a limit of either 2 cats or 1 small dog per unit.
The building has an onsite office that can receive packages during office hours, a heated pool, and an onsite car wash - great for outdoor/camping equipment!
It is conveniently located within walking distance to restaurants, grocery shopping, bars, Pike Place Market, Downtown, Amazon, hospitals, multiple transit options; busses, light rail, streetcar.
Across the street from the newly re-done First Hill Park - great for your dog or lunch in the sun.
